prompt_cn: 让图中坐着的人站起来，保持背景不变。
prompt_en: Make the person sitting in the image stand up, keeping the background unchanged.

prompt_cn: 让图中躺着的狗坐起来，保持它的头部朝向不变。
prompt_en: Make the dog lying down in the image sit up, keeping its head direction unchanged.

prompt_cn: 让图中坐在椅子上的猫蜷缩起来。
prompt_en: Make the cat sitting on the chair curl up.

prompt_cn: 将这张建筑照片的视角从仰视改为平视。
prompt_en: Change the perspective of this architectural photo from a worm's-eye view to an eye-level view.

prompt_cn: 将照片中的立面视角从左侧 45 度斜视改为正对平视。
prompt_en: Change the facade perspective from a 45-degree angle on the left to a straight, eye-level view.

prompt_cn: 将这张街道照片的广角畸变矫正为标准透视。
prompt_en: Correct the wide-angle distortion of this street photo to a standard perspective.

prompt_cn: 让图中靠墙站着的人完全直立站好。
prompt_en: Make the person leaning against the wall stand completely straight.

prompt_cn: 将图中女人的侧面姿势转为正面。
prompt_en: Change the woman's profile pose in the image to a front-facing one.

prompt_cn: 将停车场照片的视角从俯视（航拍）改为平视。
prompt_en: Change the perspective of the car park photo from a top-down (aerial) view to an eye-level view.

prompt_cn: 修正这张山脉全景照片的水平线倾斜角度，保持山体形状不变。
prompt_en: Correct the tilt angle of the horizon in this mountain panorama, keeping the mountain shapes unchanged.

prompt_cn: 让图中正在爬行的婴儿坐好。
prompt_en: Make the baby crawling on the rug sit up.

prompt_cn: 让图中停在树枝上的鸟将头背向镜头。
prompt_en: Make the bird perched on the branch turn its head away from the camera.

prompt_cn: 将舞者在半空中的身体姿势改为在地面上的平衡姿势。
prompt_en: Change the dancer's mid-air body posture to a balanced posture on the ground.

prompt_cn: 将房子的航拍图改为从前院拍摄的平视角度。
prompt_en: Change the aerial view of the house to an eye-level angle taken from the front yard.

prompt_cn: 将雕像的视角从低角度改为等高视角。
prompt_en: Change the statue's perspective from a low angle to an equal height angle.

prompt_cn: 将他/她的表情修改为：略带愤怒的惊讶表情。
prompt_en: Change his/her expression to be: surprised with a hint of anger.

prompt_cn: 让她看起来带着不屑和好奇心。
prompt_en: Make her look disdainful and curious.

prompt_cn: 将男士的表情改为严肃
prompt_en: Change the man's expression to be serious.

prompt_cn: 将孩子的表情修改为：带有疑惑和恐惧。
prompt_en: Change the child's expression to be confused and fearful.

prompt_cn: 让青少年的表情看起来带着放松。
prompt_en: Make the teenager's expression look relaxed.

prompt_cn: 将老人的侧脸表情改为：带有沉思和满意。
prompt_en: Change the elderly person's profile expression to: contemplation and satisfaction.

prompt_cn: 将模特的表情改为：一种难以言喻的、混合了怀旧和疲惫的复杂情绪。
prompt_en: Change the model's expression to: an indescribable, complex emotion mixing nostalgia and exhaustion.

prompt_cn: 让他/她看起来带有痛苦和决心的表情。
prompt_en: Make him/her look with an expression of pain and determination.

prompt_cn: 让她/他看起来带着一种带有惊喜和担忧的表情。
prompt_en: Make her/him look with an expression that is surprise and worry.

prompt_cn: 将他/她的表情修改为：轻蔑。
prompt_en: Change his/her expression to be: contempt.

prompt_cn: 将照片中的人物表情修改为：带有专注和 迷茫。
prompt_en: Change the subject's expression in the photo to be: focus and bewilderment.

prompt_cn: 让图中坐在扶手椅上的人保持上半身姿势不变，双腿改为交叉。
prompt_en: Make the person sitting in the armchair keep the upper body posture unchanged, but change the legs to be crossed.

prompt_cn: 将跑车的低角度照片改为俯视 45 度的视角。
prompt_en: Change the sports car's low-angle photo to a 45-degree top-down perspective.

prompt_cn: 让他/她看手机时的表情带有失望和不耐烦。
prompt_en: Make his/her expression while looking at the phone be disappointment and impatience.

prompt_cn: 双语 Prompt (CN
prompt_en: EN)

prompt_cn: 修复路牌上模糊不清的文字，并将其内容改为“Central Avenue”。
prompt_en: Repair the blurred text on the road sign and change its content to "Central Avenue".

prompt_cn: 补全墙面上被遮挡的字母，使其可读并保持透视和阴影一致。
prompt_en: Complete the letters on the wall obscured, making them legible while maintaining perspective and shadow consistency.

prompt_cn: 矫正产品包装上反光的标签文字，使其与包装边缘平行。
prompt_en: Correct the reflective label text on the product packaging, making it parallel to the packaging edge.

prompt_cn: 修复老报纸上被撕裂和褪色的文字，保持纸张的旧纹理。
prompt_en: Repair the torn and faded text on the old newspaper, retaining the aged texture of the paper.

prompt_cn: 修复霓虹灯招牌上不亮或断裂的字母，使其显示完整的单词"OPEN"。
prompt_en: Repair the unlit or broken letters on the neon sign to display the complete word "OPEN".

prompt_cn: 清晰化黑板菜单上模糊的文字，并将其内容改为"Special Today: Pizza"。
prompt_en: Clarify the smudged text on the chalkboard menu and change its content to "Special Today: Pizza".

prompt_cn: 从粗糙的木纹表面上恢复底下的木纹。
prompt_en: Restore the wood grain on the rough wood texture surface.

prompt_cn: 修复在水面反射中被扭曲的倒影，使其内容清晰可读。
prompt_en: Repair the water reflection, making its content clearly legible.

prompt_cn: 修复衬衫上部分褪色的印花文字，使其颜色均匀，内容正确。
prompt_en: Repair the partially faded printed text on the shirt, making the color uniform and the content correct.

prompt_cn: 矫正书脊上倾斜的文字，使其完全垂直于书脊。
prompt_en: Correct the tilted text on the book spine, making it perfectly perpendicular to the spine.

prompt_cn: 修复建筑立面上因视角产生的严重透视扭曲文字，并保持阴影一致。
prompt_en: Repair the severely perspective-distorted text on the building facade caused by the viewpoint, and maintain shadow consistency.

prompt_cn: 从高反光的金属表面无痕移除蚀刻的文字，保持高光和反射的连续性。
prompt_en: Seamlessly remove the etched text from the highly reflective metal surface, maintaining the continuity of highlights and reflections.

prompt_cn: 修复在揉皱的纸张上因折痕而断裂的文字，保持折痕的几何结构。
prompt_en: Repair the text on crumpled paper that is broken due to creases, maintaining the geometric structure of the creases.

prompt_cn: 修复屏幕上因眩光（Glare）而不可读的文字，并保持屏幕的亮度和反光。
prompt_en: Repair the text on the screen made illegible by glare, maintaining the brightness and reflection of the screen.

prompt_cn: 修复路面上被磨损的白色交通标记文字，使其清晰，并与路面纹理融合。
prompt_en: Repair the worn white traffic marking text on the road, making it clear and blending with the road surface texture.

prompt_cn: 移除窗户上反射的对话气泡贴纸，恢复窗户外的景色。
prompt_en: Remove the reflected dialogue bubble sticker on the window, restoring the view outside the window.

prompt_cn: 修复键盘按键上被磨损的字母，使其清晰完整。
prompt_en: Repair the worn letters on the keyboard keys, making them clear and complete.

prompt_cn: 无痕移除地图上的指南针图形覆盖层（Compass Rose Overlay），恢复地图的细节。
prompt_en: Seamlessly remove the compass rose graphic overlay from the map, restoring the map details.

prompt_cn: 从混凝土墙面上无痕移除喷漆文字，恢复墙面的原始纹理。
prompt_en: Seamlessly remove spray-painted text from the concrete wall, restoring the original wall texture.

prompt_cn: 修复手写便条上因墨水晕染而模糊的文字，使其清晰可读。
prompt_en: Repair the blurred text on the handwritten note caused by ink bleeding, making it clearly legible.

prompt_cn: 修复收据上褪色的热敏打印文字，使其重新清晰显示。
prompt_en: Repair the faded thermal print text on the receipt, making it clearly visible again.

prompt_cn: 修复砖墙上正在褪色的手绘招牌文字，增强其可读性和颜色。
prompt_en: Repair the fading hand-painted sign text on the brick wall, enhancing its readability and color.

prompt_cn: 从玻璃门上移除蚀刻文字，恢复均匀的透明效果。
prompt_en: Remove etched text from the frosted glass door, restoring the uniform clear effect.

prompt_cn: 修复文件上部分不清晰的文字，使其完整可辨认。
prompt_en: Repair the partially illegible text on the document, making it fully recognizable.

prompt_cn: 修复白板上被擦花的马克笔文字，使其笔画清晰连贯。
prompt_en: Repair the smeared marker text on the whiteboard, making the strokes clear and coherent.

prompt_cn: 无痕移除广告牌上叠加的品牌Logo，恢复背景广告画面。
prompt_en: Seamlessly remove the overlaid brand logo from the billboard, restoring the background advertisement.

prompt_cn: 修复皮肤上褪色的纹身文字，增强其黑色墨水的对比度。
prompt_en: Repair the faded tattoo lettering on the skin, enhancing the black ink contrast.

prompt_cn: 清除黑板文字上的擦拭痕迹，使文字边缘清晰整齐。
prompt_en: Remove eraser marks from the chalkboard text, making the text edges clean and neat.

prompt_cn: 提升图中人物的面部细节和皮肤质感，使其更加清晰。
prompt_en: Enhance the facial details and skin texture of the person in the image to make it clearer.

prompt_cn: 增强图中人物与动物的边缘锐度，还原毛发细节。
prompt_en: Enhance the edge sharpness of the person and animal in the image, restoring fur details.

prompt_cn: 对图中的文字标识进行超分辨率处理，提高可读性。
prompt_en: Perform super-resolution on the text signs in the image to improve readability.

prompt_cn: 聚焦并放大图中的主体人物，忽略背景杂质。
prompt_en: Focus on and upscale the main subject person in the image, ignoring background noise.

prompt_cn: 清晰化远处的路标信息，修复模糊的边缘。
prompt_en: Clarify the distant road sign information and fix blurry edges.

prompt_cn: 在暗光环境下提亮机械结构，增强工业设备的可见度。
prompt_en: Brighten the mechanical structure in a dark environment and enhance the visibility of industrial equipment.

prompt_cn: 减少弱光下的图像噪点，清晰展现机器人的轮廓。
prompt_en: Reduce image noise in low light and clearly display the robot's outline.

prompt_cn: 提升夜间驾驶画面的亮度，确保道路细节清晰可见。
prompt_en: Improve the brightness of the night driving scene to ensure road details are clearly visible.

prompt_cn: 优化暗光下显示屏的对比度，使导航界面更易读。
prompt_en: Optimize the contrast of the display screen in low light to make the navigation interface more readable.

prompt_cn: 恢复暗光区域的纹理，增强自动化作业环境的可视性。
prompt_en: Restore textures in dark areas and enhance the visibility of the automated working environment.

prompt_cn: 消除物体表面的强烈眩光，恢复被遮盖的细节。
prompt_en: Eliminate strong glare on the surface of objects and restore covered details.

prompt_cn: 抑制画面中的过曝区域，找回高亮部分的图像信息。
prompt_en: Suppress overexposed areas in the image and retrieve image information from the highlights.

prompt_cn: 移除画面中的镜头光斑和眩光，还原前方道路信息。
prompt_en: Remove lens flare and glare from the image to restore the road information ahead.

prompt_cn: 调整画面曝光平衡，消除工业光源带来的视觉干扰。
prompt_en: Adjust image exposure balance and eliminate visual interference caused by industrial light sources.

prompt_cn: 减少挡风玻璃或屏幕上的反光，使驾驶导航信息清晰。
prompt_en: Reduce reflections on the windshield or screen to make driving navigation information clear.

prompt_cn: 更改图中人物所穿的衣服款式和颜色。
prompt_en: Change the style and color of the clothes worn by the person in the image.

prompt_cn: 为图中的人物添加一件时尚的配饰（如帽子或眼镜）。
prompt_en: Add a stylish accessory (such as a hat or glasses) to the person in the image.

keyword: full body photo of a person
keyword_formatted: full body photo of a person
prompt_cn: 修改人物的站立姿态，使其更具时尚感。
prompt_en: Modify the person's standing pose to make it more fashionable.

prompt_cn: 改变图中人物的发型和发色。
prompt_en: Change the hairstyle and hair color of the person in the image.

prompt_cn: 将人物的服装更换为另一种季节的时尚风格。
prompt_en: Change the person's clothing to a different seasonal fashion style.
